Text.Page:
I tried to map this crazy place, but the Ksharans caught me and tortured me. They fled when Kaidun arrived, but it took me days to get free.

I have to get out of here! This place terrifies me. I can still see the horrible eyes of those hell torturers staring down at me. I can't face them, not without weapons! Can you clear them out of the way?
You brought me their torture tools? That's...fantastic! They can't scare me anymore, not when I have these.
Don't let them torture you too, <PCNAME>.
